question: What types of yoga classes do you offer?
answer: We offer a wide range of online classes including Hatha Yoga, Vinyasa Flow, Ashtanga, Meditation, Pranayama, Power Yoga, Restorative Yoga, Yoga Nidra, and goal-focused sessions such as flexibility, strength, weight loss, emotional balance, and posture improvement.

question: Are the classes suitable for beginners?
answer: Yes. We have dedicated beginner sessions and gentle practices designed for first-time learners.

question: Do I need prior experience to join?
answer: No. Our classes are beginner-friendly. Every instructor provides clear guidance, modifications, and step-by-step instructions.

question: How much do the classes cost?
answer: Our pricing varies depending on the class type and plan you choose. We offer single-class passes, monthly memberships, and long-term packages so you can pick what fits your routine and budget.

question: Do you offer subscription plans or packages?
answer: Yes. We offer flexible subscription options including monthly, quarterly, half-yearly, and yearly plans.

question: Is there a free trial available?
answer: Yes, new members can join a free trial class to experience our teaching style and overall environment before committing to a plan.

question: Do you offer classes for specific goals such as stress, flexibility, or weight loss?
answer: Yes. We provide goal-based classes including stress relief, flexibility, posture correction, strength building, weight management, and mindfulness.

question: Do you offer advanced-level yoga classes?
answer: Yes, we offer advanced sessions that include challenging asanas, deeper holds, advanced transitions, breath-work, and alignment refinement.

question: How do I join the Zoom class?
answer: After booking a class or purchasing a plan, you’ll receive a unique Zoom link and login details via email and WhatsApp.

question: What equipment or space do I need at home?
answer: You only need a yoga mat and about 6–7 feet of space. Optional props include a cushion, blocks, or a strap.

question: Will the instructor be able to see me during class?
answer: Yes—if your camera is on. This helps the instructor observe your posture and offer corrections.

question: Do I need to keep my camera on?
answer: It's recommended but not required. Keeping it on supports safer and more personalized guidance.

question: Are group classes cheaper than 1-on-1 sessions?
answer: Yes, group sessions are more cost-effective. However, 1-on-1 sessions provide customized coaching and full instructor attention.

question: How personalized are the 1-on-1 sessions?
answer: Every 1-on-1 class is customized to your goals, health conditions, body type, and progress.

question: Can I switch my coach or instructor?
answer: Yes, you can switch anytime based on your comfort and preference.

question: Can the instructor help with specific goals or health conditions?
answer: Yes. Our instructors can support goals like weight loss, flexibility, stress relief, and can adapt the practice for special conditions.

question: How long is each session?
answer: 1-on-1 sessions are usually 60 minutes. Group classes are either 30 or 60 minutes.

question: How many people are in a typical group class?
answer: Group classes usually have 10–30 participants depending on the session.

question: Are group sessions interactive?
answer: Yes. You can ask questions, receive guidance, and get corrections from the instructor.

question: Are the classes live or recorded?
answer: Most classes are live. Selected sessions may offer recordings.

question: Who are the instructors?
answer: Our instructors are certified professionals with years of experience and formal education in yoga.

question: What certifications do the instructors hold?
answer: Most instructors hold RYT 200/300/500 certifications and are trained in Hatha, Ashtanga, Meditation, Pranayama, and alignment-based practices.

question: Do you offer prenatal or postnatal yoga?
answer: Yes, we offer safe and specialized prenatal and postnatal sessions.

question: Are there senior-friendly or injury-friendly classes?
answer: Yes, we have gentle sessions designed for seniors and those recovering from injuries.

question: Can family members join my 1-on-1 session?
answer: Yes, you can invite family or friends. A small additional fee may apply.

question: Does yoga over video conferencing really work?
answer: Yes, many students train successfully online and see great results with guided practice.

question: Do unused sessions roll over?
answer: Yes, unused hours roll over for up to six billing cycles as long as your membership remains active.

question: Are 1-on-1 sessions recorded?
answer: Yes, sessions may be recorded for your benefit. Only you, your coach, and the care team can access them.

question: What is the cancellation policy?
answer: Cancel 12+ hours in advance for no charge. Late cancellations or missed sessions count as completed.

question: How do I upgrade, downgrade, pause, or cancel my membership?
answer: You can upgrade anytime, downgrade at the next billing cycle, pause for 7–60 days per year, or cancel anytime.

question: Do coaches come to my home?
answer: Not physically. Your coach joins you live on Zoom.

question: How do I get started?
answer: Sign up on the website or app, and schedule your free trial session.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can reach support via email, WhatsApp, phone, or live chat on the website.

question: Will I receive reminders before class?
answer: Yes, reminders are sent via email, WhatsApp, or Telegram so you never miss a session.

question: Will I receive preparation instructions?
answer: Yes. You’ll receive simple guidelines on setup, equipment, and how to get the best experience.

question: Can the coach see me well enough over Zoom?
answer: Absolutely! Our coaches can see your posture clearly enough to correct even the smallest movements. You only need a phone or laptop, but if you want a 360° view, you can use your phone on the side and laptop in front.

question: Will I be charged for the free session?
answer: No. Your first session is completely free and doesn’t require a credit card. After the session, you can choose to pay per session or join a membership.

question: How do I join my free session?
answer: Once you sign up, you’ll receive a Zoom link via email along with a reminder before the session. Just click and join.

question: Do I need any fitness equipment?
answer: No equipment is required. If you have some, your coach can incorporate it. If you want to buy weights or props later, your coach can guide you.

question: How are your personal training prices so low?
answer: By using smart technology and partnering with expert coaches from India, we provide high-quality personal training at significantly lower rates compared to traditional in-person training.

question: Who can join GlobalYogaSpace?
answer: Anyone interested in yoga or fitness, regardless of experience level.

question: Are the coaches certified?
answer: Yes, all coaches are qualified yoga and fitness professionals.

question: Can I join group classes anytime?
answer: Yes, daily group classes are available and open to everyone.

question: Can I switch between group and 1-on-1 sessions?
answer: Yes, you can mix and match based on your goals and schedule.
